title: 8. When you consider your current household income from all sources, would you say that you are...

encodings: 2=Have just enough to make ends meet
3=Do NOT have enough to make ends meet

title: 9. Which of the following best describes your current employment (work) situation?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 9. Which of the following best describes your current employment (work) situation?
encodings: 3=Out of work for more than 1 year
4=Out of work for less than 1 year
8=Unable to work (for health or disability reasons)
